author: Special Correspondent
text:
In the latest shuffle of IAS officers, T. Udhayachandran, presently Secretary (Expenditure) in Finance Department was transferred and posted as Secretary to Tamil Development and Information Department.

Mr. Udhayachandran would continue to hold the post of Principal Secretary in Backward Classes, Most Backward Classes and Minorities Welfare Department in full additional charge, an order from the Chief Secretary stated.

As per the transfers, Executive Director of Chennai Metropolitan Water Supply and Sewerage Board (CMWSSB) Sandeep Nanduri is posted as Madurai Corporation Commissioner.

Former Principal Secretary in Tourism Department K. Rajaraman is posted as Director of Entrepreneurship Development Institute and Perambalur Collector Darez Ahamed is transferred and posted as Mission Director of State Rural Health Mission. Ambuj Sharma, presently Additional Secretary in Heavy Industries Department, is posted as Industries Commissioner. Joint Commissioner in Municipal Administration M. Asia Mariam is posted as Deputy Commissioner (Education) of Chennai Corporation.
title: Udhayachandran, new Information Secretary
